visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: The chart should have a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis should display months with labels rotated 90 degrees. The y-axis should have default styling. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data with the name 'Rainfall'. The chart should use custom colors ['#008000', '#0000FF']. Additional configurations include setting the chart's bottom margin to 80 pixels and a white background.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis displays months with labels rotated 90 degrees for better readability. The y-axis is titled 'Rainfall (mm)' with default styling. The data series named 'Rainfall' represents monthly rainfall data. The chart uses custom colors ['#008000', '#0000FF'] for the series. Additional configurations include setting the chart's bottom margin to 80 pixels and a white background for better contrast and visibility.
